ygData.subject: [The EverQuest Tavern] Re: How do you get married on evequest?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If you re talking about my character... no, level 13 isn t really that young. I started playing EQ about a month after beta as did my good lady friend from
ygData.messageBody:
--- In theeverquesttavern@y..., xela_orcbane <no_reply@y...> wrote:
> I don't know... lvl 13 seems like an aweful young age to get
> married. I mean, as a caster, you don't really have a lot of spells

If you're talking about my character... no, level 13 isn't really that
young. I started playing EQ about a month after beta as did my good
lady friend from Canada and leveling from 1 to 13 then was a lot more
difficult. Painful when the game was still young and banded was the
hot commodity. ;)
